body_html:
That's fine. We'll clean this up after you push.

On Mon, Nov 14, 2016 at 7:51 AM, Alexander Rosenberg Johansen <
notifications@github.com> wrote:

@lmthang https://github.com/lmthang @ebrevdo
https://github.com/ebrevdo we now have support for BasicLSTMCell.
However, to make it work I had to include this hack
https://github.com/alrojo/tensorflow/blob/dynamic_decoder/tensorflow/contrib/seq2seq/python/ops/decoder_fn.py#L36
to the init of the decoder functions.

—
You are receiving this because you were mentioned.
Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub
#4686 (comment),
or mute the thread
https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/ABtimwFQiYxEPZT98UUeZnFljT9Wjri8ks5q-IN0gaJpZM4KLMiD
.

That's fine.  We'll clean this up after you push.

On Mon, Nov 14, 2016 at 7:51 AM, Alexander Rosenberg Johansen <
notifications@github.com> wrote:

> @lmthang https://github.com/lmthang @ebrevdo
> https://github.com/ebrevdo we now have support for BasicLSTMCell.
> However, to make it work I had to include this hack
> https://github.com/alrojo/tensorflow/blob/dynamic_decoder/tensorflow/contrib/seq2seq/python/ops/decoder_fn.py#L36
> to the init of the decoder functions.
> 
> —
